news.content:
üåç Today is Earth Day


A good reminder that we all must do our part to combat climate change. At ThreeFold we believe in "Planet First." This is why we are working towards a regenerative Internet.


Some ThreeFold Earth Day content for you:


  • ThreeFold is a Sustainable Alternative (Video)
  • Farming ‚Äì A Greener Alternative to Mining
  • ThreeFold on track to be Planet-Positive
  • This ThreeFold Farm Keeps Veggies Warm
  • A Better Solution For Our Planet

And take a look at a couple of conversations happening in the forum around green farming!
news.excerpt: At ThreeFold, we believe in "Planet First." Take a look at some of the ways ThreeFold is acting to positively impact the planet.

previous.title: Europe's Next-Gen Edge Computing Platform
previous.excerpt: We've submitted a joint proposal to the European Commission to build Europe's next-generation edge computing platform!

next.title: DigiByte integrates with ThreeFold‚Äôs decentralized Grid
next.excerpt: The DigiByte Foundation and the ThreeFold Foundation are aligned ‚Äì both focused on values, working towards their visions and missions in creating a truly decentralized, equal, and sustainable world that empowers humanity.
